org.apache.juneau.xml

Class XmlSerializerContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Context
      • org.apache.juneau.BeanContext
        • org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerContext
          • org.apache.juneau.xml.XmlSerializerContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HtmlSerializerContext

    public class XmlSerializerContext
extends SerializerContext
    Configurable properties on the XmlSerializer class.

    Context properties are set by calling PropertyStore.setProperty(String, Object) on the property store passed into the constructor.

    See PropertyStore for more information about context properties.

    Inherited configurable properties:
    • BeanContext - Properties associated with handling beans on serializers and parsers.
      • SerializerContext - Configurable properties common to all serializers.

    • Field Detail

      • XML_enableNamespaces

        public static final String XML_enableNamespaces
        Configuration property: Enable support for XML namespaces.

        • Name: "XmlSerializer.enableNamespaces"
        • Data type: Boolean
        • Default: false
        • Session-overridable: true

        If not enabled, XML output will not contain any namespaces regardless of any other settings.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_autoDetectNamespaces

        public static final String XML_autoDetectNamespaces
        Configuration property: Auto-detect namespace usage.

        • Name: "XmlSerializer.autoDetectNamespaces"
        • Data type: Boolean
        • Default: true
        • Session-overridable: true

        Detect namespace usage before serialization.

        Used in conjunction with XML_addNamespaceUrisToRoot to reduce the list of namespace URLs appended to the root element to only those that will be used in the resulting document.

        If enabled, then the data structure will first be crawled looking for namespaces that will be encountered before the root element is serialized.

        This setting is ignored if XML_enableNamespaces is not enabled.

        Notes:
        • Auto-detection of namespaces can be costly performance-wise. In high-performance environments, it's recommended that namespace detection be disabled, and that namespaces be manually defined through the XML_namespaces property.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_addNamespaceUrisToRoot

        public static final String XML_addNamespaceUrisToRoot
        Configuration property: Add namespace URLs to the root element.

        • Name: "XmlSerializer.addNamespaceUrisToRoot"
        • Data type: Boolean
        • Default: false
        • Session-overridable: true

        Use this setting to add xmlns:x attributes to the root element for the default and all mapped namespaces.

        This setting is ignored if XML_enableNamespaces is not enabled.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_defaultNamespace

        public static final String XML_defaultNamespace
        Configuration property: Default namespace.

        • Name: "XmlSerializer.defaultNamespace"
        • Data type: String
        • Default: "{juneau:'http://www.apache.org/2013/Juneau'}"
        • Session-overridable: true

        Specifies the default namespace URI for this document.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_xsNamespace

        public static final String XML_xsNamespace
        Configuration property: XMLSchema namespace.

        • Name: "XmlSerializer.xsNamespace"
        • Data type: Namespace
        • Default: {name:'xs',uri:'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema'}
        • Session-overridable: true

        Specifies the namespace for the XMLSchema namespace, used by the schema generated by the XmlSchemaSerializer class.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_namespaces

        public static final String XML_namespaces
        Configuration property: Default namespaces.

        • Name: "XmlSerializer.namespaces"
        • Data type: Set<Namespace>
        • Default: empty set
        • Session-overridable: true

        The default list of namespaces associated with this serializer.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_addBeanTypeProperties

        public static final String XML_addBeanTypeProperties
        Configuration property: Add "_type" properties when needed.

        • Name: "XmlSerializer.addBeanTypeProperties"
        • Data type: Boolean
        • Default: false
        • Session-overridable: true

        If true, then "_type" properties will be added to beans if their type cannot be inferred through reflection. This is used to recreate the correct objects during parsing if the object types cannot be inferred. For example, when serializing a Map<String,Object> field, where the bean class cannot be determined from the value type.

        When present, this value overrides the SerializerContext.SERIALIZER_addBeanTypeProperties setting and is provided to customize the behavior of specific serializers in a SerializerGroup.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
